text:
Hey Everyone! I am Vibhu Dhariwal, a Co-founder & Director of Marketing at Digital Gratified, a SaaS Digital Marketing Agency.

I founded Digital Gratified, two years ago with my friend when COVID was at its peak and because of it more businesses were turing to Digital Marketing.

Today, we have 50+ Direct Clients & 10+ Agency Clients. 100% Results. No Client Drop-out!

I am really excited to be part of this community!

elements.text:

text:
Hi Everyone! I’m Anne-Marie Hofmann. I’m currently working heading up a customer success team at a super fast growing SaaS scale-up, but my greatest passion is the written side of that: mass comms, on-boarding emails, documentation, etc. I also highly enjoy blogging about “self-help” (though I loath that term), relationships, and what not. I particularly love _editing_ work, and pushing people to write more authentically, in their own voice

I’m starting to steer my career focus toward written content creation so I’m here and happy to be a part of the community!

text: Hi all, happy to join Superpath, my name is Arman from France, Head of Product at <https://texau.app/|TexAu> (<http://texau.app|texau.app>) the lead generation & data extraction company.

attachments.fallback: TexAu | Growth automation to scale your business faster
attachments.text: TexAu is a growth automation toolbox that will allow you to generate new leads, contact them quickly and effortlessly, and improve your knowledge of your users.

text: Hi folks! I'm Sam Grover - copywriter and content strategist. I focus on the type of content that turns traffic into leads - lots of home pages and landing pages! Also do mid-funnel nurturing stuff, which is more content strategy than copywriting. Email sequences, long-form content to repurpose, etc. I live in New Zealand.

Excited to be here and connect with more content folks and marketers!

text: Hi everyone! I'm Lindsay McGuire from Formstack. I am the Content Marketing Manager and podcast producer of Ripple Effect. I manage our blog, create our long-form content like The Rise of the No-Code Economy, and manage customer stories + advocacy. The main verticals I cover are healthcare, fin serve, education, and software. Happy to connect and learn! I'm based in Indianapolis

text: Hey all! I’m Briana, currently at NeighborSchools, an edtech startup in Boston, and consulting for a few small businesses. text: Hello! Not all of our members are guys. In an effort to be more conscious of the language we use to address each other, why not try “Hey, folks,” or “Hey everyone” instead?

Hello everyone,
I'm Lubhanshi, working at Stella Brands, my digital marketing agency. I help startups and SMEs build strategies and implement them, be it their content strategy, social media strategy, branding strategy, or overall marketing strategy. I also provide assistance to startups by adding the monetizing element to the system.

text:
Hey everyone! 
I am Momina — a freelance content marketer for B2B and B2C SaaS. My expertise is long form blogs, email copy and social media content. 

I recently went full-time freelancing and I am loving every minute of it. Excited to be in this community to learn more and connect with other freelancers! 

Cheers!
